attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Respected Prime Minister
I am writing to you in regards to NHS. I would like you to visit the Hospital in north London. CMH/ Northwick Park and you will see for your self how the nurse treat the elder citizen of our country.In my opinion the respect for elder citizen is a the order of the day.

rejection.details: If you would like to send an invitation to the Prime Minister, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
